props.title: dependable and uniform services for diverse samples

children.value: Unlock the full potential of your research with the National Centralized Repository for Alzheimer's Disease and Related Dementias (NCRAD). NCRAD serves as a national resource where researchers can store and access an extensive collection of clinical information and biological materials. Our repository houses a diverse array of samples, including DNA, plasma, serum, RNA, CSF, cell lines, and brain tissue. These invaluable resources enable scientists to conduct cutting-edge investigations and accelerate their research efforts.

props.title: The NCRAD Advantage: Accelerating Your Research

children.value: Store and expand your research potential with NCRAD's diverse sample bank. We operate with state-of-the-art storage and processing.
Easily access samples banked at NCRAD, a vast collection with user-friendly catalogs for cutting-edge investigations.
Unlock reliable biomarker insights with NCRAD's Biomarker Assay Laboratory (BAL). Standardized processing and cross-laboratory comparability studies ensure impactful research results.

Your research journey, coordinated. NCRAD's services guide you from training to sample processing and beyond. Access resources for efficient study banking and impactful research.
